assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Obtained. This study was approved by the Mount Sinai Hospital Institutional Review Board. The family is enrolled in the Familial Gastrointestinal Cancer Registry (FGICR) and the International BMMRD Consortium.
